description: Cloudpipe extension is broken with keystone.  It also seems to be suffering from the network refactor.  The extension code should be fixed to work with keystone and the old nova-manage code should be removed
title: cloudpipe broken with keystone

comments.content: Cloudpipe extension is broken with keystone.  It also seems to be suffering from the network refactor.  The extension code should be fixed to work with keystone and the old nova-manage code should be removed
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/4526
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/4526
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/8da178d7f7334dfa0027a8ae74129943856c1fb2
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 8da178d7f7334dfa0027a8ae74129943856c1fb2
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Feb 24 18:29:34 2012 -0800

    Fixes cloudpipe extension to work with keystone
    
     * Removes deprecated auth from cloudpipe extension
     * Fixes pipelib to not use ec2_api
     * Changes vpn_image_id to be a uuid
     * Uses network api to retrieve information
     * Simplifies cloudpipe tests
     * Removes nova-manage cloudpipe launching
     * Removes related unused db methods
     * Fixes bug 940744
    
    Change-Id: I5fd1fb49a9e11b89062aa754501fed29874cb6ee
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
